items.content_html: The To-Do List project is a simple web application that helps users keep track of tasks and manage their daily activities. It provides an intuitive and interactive interface for adding, editing, and removing tasks. This project is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, making it a lightweight and accessible tool for organizing tasks online.
items.title: yasmeen-10/To-Do-List: The To-Do List project is a simple web application that helps users keep track of tasks and manage their daily activities. It provides an intuitive and interactive interface for adding, editing, and removing tasks. This project is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, making it a lightweight and accessible tool for organizing tasks online.
